title: 'The Monkey' teaser: Stephen King, Osgood Perkins, and James Wan team up for horror greatness
content: Osgood Perkins ("Longlegs") directs an adaptation of Stephen King's short story "The Monkey," starring Theo James and Tatiana Maslany.
summary: Osgood Perkins ("Longlegs") directs an adaptation of Stephen King's short story "The Monkey," starring Theo James and Tatiana Maslany.
